pr_title: Add hashCode() and equals() to ReplaceRegion

timeline.message:
add hashCode() and equals() to ReplaceRegion

Signed-off-by: mmews <marcus.mews@numberfour.eu>

timeline.bodyText:
I'm not a big fan of Object.equals(..) for primitives. It causes boxing and is distracting for the reader.
How does the equals / hashcode methods look like when they are generated by Eclipse?
timeline.author: szarnekow

timeline.bodyText: This builds an array of values including boxing conversion. I think the defaults as generated by Eclipse are better.
timeline.author: szarnekow

timeline.message:
performance improvements, add check for class

Signed-off-by: mmews <marcus.mews@numberfour.eu>
